name: expression
description: Expression functions enable dynamic evaluation and manipulation of Power Query expressions.

name: list
description: List functions work with list values, providing operations for creating, transforming, and aggregating lists.

name: logical
description: Logical functions act upon expressions to return information about the values or perform conditional operations.

name: number
description: Number functions perform mathematical operations and transformations on numeric values.

name: record
description: Record functions work with record values, providing operations for creating, accessing, and transforming structured data.

name: table
description: Functions that create, manipulate, and transform tables and their structure.

name: text
description: Text functions manipulate and transform string values, including operations for cleaning, formatting, and extracting data.

name: type
description: Type functions provide information about data types and enable type checking and conversion operations.

name: uri
description: URI functions work with Uniform Resource Identifiers, providing operations for parsing and constructing URI values.

name: value
description: Value functions provide operations for working with generic values, including comparison and conversion operations.
